video_prompt: Eiffel Tower's foliage and pink flowers sway and grow, slowly overtaking the structure. Foreground flowers bloom and shift, their petals gently moving. Clouds drift across a brightening sky. Lighting subtly changes from dawn to full daylight.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Vertical surreal vibrant Eiffel Tower, overgrown with lush green foliage and abundant vivid pink climbing flowers (roses/bougainvillea), against a bright, cloudy blue sky. Foreground of varied orange and pink dahlias. Low-angle shot, bright even lighting. Botanical masterpiece.
refined_video_prompt: Vines and pink blossoms visibly expand and writhe, gradually engulfing the Eiffel Tower. Foreground blossoms unfurl and sway, their petals subtly fluttering. Clouds actively traverse a sky that progressively brightens. Illumination gradually intensifies, transitioning from pre-dawn glow to vibrant daylight.
